text: extraordinary reports coming in now that
Andrea led some is poised to announce
that she is going to withdraw from the
campaign which goodness me she only
entered really last week but she's going
to issue a statement I understand around
about twelve o'clock and the expectation
is in that statement she will announce
she is pulling out I think largely
because of the media focus that she's
endured over the past few days she spoke
this morning in an interview in The
Telegraph about how she had found it
shattering to have that level of focus
on her also maybe she will have listened
to some of the appeals from conservative
MPs asking her to stand aside to
truncate this contest so it doesn't drag
on over the next few weeks so in effect
the country will be without a a new
government and some also pointing to the
fact that in terms of conservative MPs
the overwhelming majority nearly 200 in
fact Teresa may so all those things may
have combined together to make Andrea
legend decide that actually she's not
going to go for it that is certainly
what we are now hearing that she is
going to pull out of this contest which
would mean Teresa may would be the only
contender and would be Prime Minister
when David Cameron steps down now maybe
that will be much sooner than the 9th of
September that was the initial plan but
if there's no contest and Teresa may as
the only candidate one imagines that
could be brought forward much much
sooner
